Statements.Statement: , ifnull(`com`.DelYn,'N') AS DelYn ,`com`.`CreateId` ,date_format(`com`.CreateDt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `CreateDt` ,`com`.`UpdateId` ,date_format(`com`.UpdateDt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `UpdateDt` ,`com`.`DeleteId` ,date_format(`com`.DeleteDt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `DeleteDt`

SELECT `com`.`CompanyCode` , `com`.`Nationality` , `com`.`HeadOffice` , `com`.`CompanyGroup` , `com`.`CompanyNameK` , `com`.`CompanyNameE` , `com`.`TelNo` , `com`.`FaxNo` , `com`.`AddressK1` , `com`.`AddressK2` , `com`.`AddressE1` , `com`.`AddressE2`
FROM `TB_COMPANY` AS com WHERE 1=1
`DelYn` IS NOT NULL AND `DelYn` = 'Y'
(`DelYn` IS NULL OR `DelYn` != 'Y')

SELECT `com`.`CompanyCode` , `com`.`Nationality` , `nat`.`Name` AS NationalityName , `com`.`HeadOffice` , `com`.`CompanyGroup` , `com`.`CompanyNameK` , `com`.`CompanyNameE` , `com`.`TelNo` , `com`.`FaxNo` , `com`.`AddressK1` , `com`.`AddressK2` , `com`.`AddressE1` , `com`.`AddressE2`
FROM `TB_COMPANY` AS com LEFT JOIN tb_codedetail AS nat ON nat.MasterCode = 'NATIONALITY' AND nat.`code` = com.Nationality WHERE `com`.`CompanyCode` = @CompanyCode

INSERT INTO `TB_COMPANY` (`CompanyCode`, `Nationality`, `HeadOffice`, `CompanyGroup`, `CompanyNameK`, `CompanyNameE`, `TelNo`, `FaxNo`, `AddressK1`, `AddressK2`, `AddressE1`, `AddressE2`, `CreateId`, `CreateDt` ) VALUES (@CompanyCode, @Nationality, @HeadOffice, @CompanyGroup, @CompanyNameK, @CompanyNameE, @TelNo, @FaxNo, @AddressK1, @AddressK2, @AddressE1, @AddressE2, @CreateId, now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `Nationality` = @Nationality, `HeadOffice` = @HeadOffice, `CompanyGroup` = @CompanyGroup, `CompanyNameK` = @CompanyNameK, `CompanyNameE` = @CompanyNameE, `TelNo` = @TelNo, `FaxNo` = @FaxNo, `AddressK1` = @AddressK1, `AddressK2` = @AddressK2, `AddressE1` = @AddressE1, `AddressE2` = @AddressE2, `UpdateId` = @UpdateId, `UpdateDt` = now(), `DeleteId` = @DeleteId, `DeleteDt` = null ;
